Alert Name: bush
U.S. to spell out new trade rules soon
Bush administration will introduce changes to free trade agreements with four countries under a new deal with Congress.
05/11/07 01:41 PM, EDT
The Bush administration will move quickly to present Panama, Peru, Colombia and South Korea with proposed changes to free trade agreements required under a new bipartisan trade policy deal with Congress, U.S. trade officials said Friday.
FULL STORY
